short_summary: Purchasing some webcams (initial 7500 units, expected usage of full year)
description: Natural Resources Canada is looking to pick up some webcams, this will be an open procurement which will end in 34 days.",", (29/12/2022 to 31/01/2023). Suppliers are encouraged to submit their bids in either official Canadian language and the contract is for 1 year, deliveries are expected before 31st of March.",",",
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Title:** Webcams for Natural Resources Canada (Contract SSC-23-00021297)
------------------------------------

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

The Government of Canada has issued a solicitation notice for webcams to be supplied to Natural Resources Canada. This procurement is being conducted openly due to the National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) not allowing for the desired quantity of webcams to be purchased.

### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation No.:** SSC-23-00021297
*   **Title:** Webcams for Natural Resources Canada
*   **Department:** Natural Resources Canada
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Notice Period:** 34 days (January 29, 2023, to January 31, 2023)
*   **Total Potential Quantity:** 7500 units
*   **Contract Duration:** Estimated 1 year
*   **Delivery Destination:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
*   **Delivery Date:** Before March 31, 2023

### Technical Requirements

*   **Product Delivery:** Spring-loaded website submittal past the authorized modification date

### Non-Derogable Terms

*   **Security Requirements:** None
*   **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements:** None

### Submitting Bids

Bids can be submitted through the [Government of Canada's procurement platform](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login). Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information

For inquiries or to submit a bid, please contact:

*   **Rashawn Griffith**, Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada
*   **Email:** <rashawn.griffith@ssc-spc.gc.ca>
*   **Phone:** 343-549-9539

### Amendment

This procurement announcement includes Amendment 007.

Remember to follow the format with proper headers, numbered lists, or bullet points as necessary to keep the rewritten text organized. The length of the rewritten text should not exceed 400 words. 

Also, ensure that only the most relevant details are included to maintain the professionalism of the text while still conveying the essential information about the government tender announcement. 

Your rewritten text should look like this:
